Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.interfaces.speechrecognizer.AvsListenItem
    Check for AvsExpectSpeechItem instead
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.interfaces.speechrecognizer.SpeechSendVoice
    Use SpeechSendAudio instead, either with a byte[] or using the streamed RequestBody
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.sendAudioRequest(int, byte[], AsyncCallback<AvsResponse, Exception>)
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.sendTextRequest(int, String, AsyncCallback<AvsResponse, Exception>)
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.startRecording(AsyncCallback<Void, Exception>)
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.startRecording(byte[], AsyncCallback<Void, Exception>)
    - Deprecated because of the difficulty of managing Application state in an external library. Avoid using this and AlexaManager.stopRecording(AsyncCallback), use AlexaManager.sendAudioRequest(byte[], AsyncCallback) and manage state within your Application/Activity.
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.startRecording(int, AsyncCallback<Void, Exception>)
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.startRecording(int, byte[], AsyncCallback<Void, Exception>)
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.startRecording(int, String, AsyncCallback<Void, Exception>)
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.startRecording(String, AsyncCallback<Void, Exception>)
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.interfaces.speechrecognizer.SpeechSendVoice.startRecording(String, String, byte[], AsyncCallback<Void, Exception>)
    Manage this state on the application side, instead, and send the audio using SpeechSendAudio
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.interfaces.speechrecognizer.SpeechSendVoice.stopRecording()
    Manage this state on the application side, instead, and send the audio using SpeechSendAudio
    com.willblaschko.android.alexa.AlexaManager.stopRecording(AsyncCallback<AvsResponse, Exception>)
    - Deprecated because of the difficulty of managing Application state in an external library. Avoid using this and AlexaManager.startRecording(AsyncCallback) (AsyncCallback)}, use AlexaManager.sendAudioRequest(byte[], AsyncCallback) and manage state within your Application/Activity.
